DOC.brief_title: Continuous Venovenous Hemodiafiltration Versus Sustained Low-efficiency Hemodialysis Critically Ill Patients With Acute Kidney Injury Intensive Care Unit
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator perform single center experience accumulate 12 month since February 2009 continuous venovenous hemodiafiltration ( CVVHDF ) hybrid technique name sustain low-efficiency dialysis ( SLED ) . The primary end point death cause day 30 . Intensive care unit ( ICU ) patient eligible inclusion serum creatinine > 2 mg/dL , renal replacement therapy ( RRT ) initiate . The selected patient treat CVVHDF SLED .
DOC.criteria: The inclusion criterion 1 . AKI require RRT 2 . Hemodynamic instability define systolic blood pressure ≤ 90 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure ≤ 60 mmHg 3 . Patients require initiation vasopressor support Patients preexist chronic kidney disease ( eGFR less 30 mLmin/1.73m2 ) exclude
